#summary Get the server on which a call can be found based on an invite ID

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_guest


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
|| *Required* || *Name* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| required || invite_id || string || Invite ID returned from [CreateInvite Create Invite] ||
</table>


==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
|| *Code* || *Exception* || *Description* ||
|| 500 || SerializableException || Call for inviteid=#### not found ||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <joinCall inviteId="tbhmvhijb890aw7j">
          <callId>b8sfo3azkfsftcb9</callId>
          <server></server>
          <caller>
               <jabberId>######@jabber.dev.tokbox.com</jabberId>
               <fullName></fullName>
          </caller>
     </joinCall>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/calls/join</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="####"/>
     <timer startTime="1221984888.8777" execTime="62.808036804199"/>
</tokResult>
}}}
